Question.Subject: Does anyone know of any free no-ad hosting sites?
Question.Content: I just need hosting for my .com site. It does not need much, I will only have a couple pages up, no videos or anything so I don't need much space. It is more of just a landing site with links to other sites like blogs and such already hosted else where. All I need is a place I can use my .com and a place that does not have any advertisements.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
